description: Implement a simple cache system with set(key, value) and get(key). If key missing in get, return -1. Support 'clear' operation to remove all entries.
Read lines from stdin. Each line is a number. Output the sum of all numbers.
Write a function parse_csv(text) that returns a list of dictionaries. Assume first line is header.
实现一个计算器 (Calculator). 支持 add, sub, mul. 输入是 operations list. 输出结果 list. Handle division by zero by returning null.
Ticket system. create_ticket(title) -> id. close_ticket(id). list_tickets() -> list of open tickets. IDs should be auto-incrementing integers starting at 1.
Function is_prime(n). Returns boolean. n is integer.
CLI tool that takes a filename as argument and prints its size in bytes. (Note: this is arg based, not stdin, but fits CLI)
Flatten a nested list of integers. e.g. [[1,2], [3]] -> [1,2,3].
Extract emails from text. 提取文本中的所有邮箱地址。Return list of strings.
